"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data & Analytics Disciplines\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Specialists from D&A Practice are united by their love for data, but \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"differ a lot by skills/knowledge they possess and tasks they perform.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To organize this variety, explain existing roles in the practice and their intersections it was decided to organize the practice within \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a competency matrix which consists of 11 disciplines. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(see the schema below).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2684634,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e711d2c-bc48-4552-9b1e-8329293d3719/disciplines.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e711d2c-bc48-4552-9b1e-8329293d3719/disciplines.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"disciplines.png\",\"name\":\"disciplines.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7e711d2c-bc48-4552-9b1e-8329293d3719\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":723,\"height\":404},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each of the disciplines is different, has its own “flavors” based on various primary skills inside of it. For example, Data Analytics Engineering has three “flavors” – Visualization, Data integration and Cloud migration, while Data & Analytics Consulting includes Data Technology Consulting, Data Science Consulting and Business Analytics Consulting.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Important to mention that the matrix is live and has been evolving for a long time. In the\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-color-alt\":\"windowtext\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1718047045\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"matrix\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Gothic Light\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"major-fareast\",\"color\":\"#008ACE\",\"text-decoration\":\"none\",\"text-underline\":\"none\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-color-alt\":\"windowtext\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you can find job functions, primary skills, discipline experts and other relevant information. It reflects future opportunities and could help you create a prospective career plan. For example, the latest discipline added is Machine Learning Engineering, since this area has become one of the most trending topics.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please Software Engineering \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Software Engineers enable data-driven decision making by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"collecting, transforming, and publishing\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-weight\":\"bold\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". They should be able to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"design, build, operationalize, secure, and monitor data processing systems\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-weight\":\"bold\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" with a particular emphasis on security and compliance; scalability and efficiency; reliability and fidelity; and flexibility and portability. They also should be able to leverage, deploy, and continuously train pre-existing ML models.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Analytics Engineer covers three areas of expertise depending on the Primary Skill:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Integration Engineers \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"build modern data solutions in Clouds: construct data pipelines, builds data models, take care of data ingestion and integration for the entire company etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Analytics & Visualization Engineers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" deliver insights through business intelligence and data analysis by building E2E data analytics solutions in cloud or on-prem; build dashboards and data visualizations using tools such as Looker, Power BI, Tableau etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Database Administration (DBA) & Cloud Migration Engineer designs and implements database solutions, builds Cloud or Hybrid data solutions, defines and analyses requirements\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", evaluates new features and architecture, builds collaborative partnerships with architects and experts, analyses business problems and technical environments and use this in designing high-quality technical solutions.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[513.068359375,508.931640625]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Intelligence Analytics (BIA)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Science (DS)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Intelligence Analysts combine experience of Business Analyst and D&A expertise focusing on turning business needs into data solutions\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". This includes understanding of business needs and their translation into a solution through data; facilitation of requirement gathering and management; delivery of data discovery; data assessment among requirement management; validation of requirements through rapid prototypes / POCs / MVP; preparation of signed off requirements for mass scaled delivery (user story slicing, requirement management, estimation, prioritization) for development team.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Scientists are an inter-disciplinary experts that use scientific methods, processes, algorithms and systems to extract knowledge and insights from many structural and unstructured data. Data science is related to data mining, machine learning and big data. It is a \\\"concept to unify statistics, data analysis and their related methods\\\" in order to \\\"understand and analyze actual phenomena\\\" with data. It uses techniques and theories drawn from many fields within the context of mathematics, statistics, computer science, domain knowledge and information science.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[512.453125,508.546875]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Machine Learning Engineering (MLE) \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data DevOps \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Machine Learning Engineers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are a part of AI product cross-functional delivery team, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"responsible for ML model productionalization:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" process of turning ML models to the ML-based services. It includes but not limited to: Automation of data processing, ML model training, Inference, feedback loop, and CI/CD pipelines which are key components of AI product; Configuration of Data Science exploratory environments, ML experiments tracking, ML-based services monitoring, drift detection; improvement of Data Science code; creation of services based on ML models; Maintenance and improvement of ML-based services.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data DevOps discipline\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a domain discipline that requires extra competencies on top of regular DevOps.Automation discipline. Every DevOps.BigData engineer is DevOps.Automation engineer but not the other way around. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data DevOps deals with applications, code and processes that are revolving around data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", being it commercial, pharma or smart home sensors, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"veracity, security, volume and velocity of data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Data DevOps also should be able to plan, automate, build and support data ecosystem, like data science, computer vision and other business uses that are derived and inspired by data.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[512.9638671875,509.0361328125]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Quality Engineering (DQE)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Solution Architecture (DSA)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Quality Engineers \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"are IT specialists who \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ensure quality of data and tests data products despite the system that operates this data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". They design and deliver data testing strategy, plans and estimates resources required for data product/flow testing and validation; design and develop DQ framework according to the identified data product strategy; work closely with DQ and data governance (DG) stakeholders (incl. management) to advocate DQ within a project/organization; understand, design, and implement automated DQ checks; serve as a subject matter expert on data testing, DQ and DG; serve as a DQ champion and contribute to an inclusive teamwork.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Solutions Architects\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are experts who focus on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"solving critical business problems using Data as a key asset of the Enterprise\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". They drive customer initiatives, leveraging data services to solve data challenges faced by enterprise customers; own technical customer engagement incl. provision of guidance on project implementation, drive architectural design sessions and PoCs/PoVs; accountable for E2E data platform deployment and its usability for the end users; have experience in customer facing roles and success leading deep technical architecture and design discussions with senior executives.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[512.916015625,509.083984375]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Analytics Consulting \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Delivery Management \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Analytics Consultants expand and develop business opportunities, build & maintains relationships with clients, drive value creation\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (ownership & commitment), \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"operate under uncertainty, grow & build cross-functional teams, drive E2E engagement with customers to discover Data & Analytics opportunities and pain points\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", assembling a team of EPAM analysts & engineers and delivering Proof of Concept (PoC) or Minimal Viable Product (MVP). This discipline comprises Business Consulting (focus on domain expertise) and Technology Consulting (focus on technological expertise).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Delivery Managers are experts responsible for\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#222222\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" ensuring effective project management and D&A solutions delivery\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Data Delivery implies \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"additional competencies on top of EPAM Delivery Management discipline. Data Delivery Managers must have a good understanding of data-related problems our clients face nowadays (\\\"what\\\") and continuously develop necessary skills to deliver solutions not only by using established and evolving approaches and patterns, but also by leveraging our Data Competency Center expertise, blueprints, frameworks, accelerators, and other tools/techniques (\\\"how\\\").\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#222222\"}}}]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[1021.9052734375]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Operational Intelligence\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Operational Intelligence stands for proficiency in consulting, designing, development, deployment and support of enterprise monitoring and log analysis solutions\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". It also implies ability to help business with monitoring & troubleshooting of business flows. One of the main goals is to marry operations & business data to provide enhanced insights for different teams.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
